00012 #include "BusInterfaceDialog.h"
00013 
00014 #include <QLabel>
00015 #include <QMessageBox>
00016 #include <QCoreApplication>
00017 
00018 namespace
00019 {
00020     QString const MODE_NAMES[] =
00021     {
00022         "Master",
00023         "Slave",
00024         "Mirrored Master",
00025         "Mirrored Slave",
00026         "System",
00027         "Mirrored System",
00028         "Monitor"
00029     }; 
00030 }

00032 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 // Function: BusInterfaceDialog()
00034 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 BusInterfaceDialog::BusInterfaceDialog(bool enableNameEdit,
00036                                        QWidget* parent) : QDialog(parent), nameEdit_(0),
00037                                                           modeGroup_(0), btnOK_(0)
00038 {
00039     setWindowTitle(tr("Define Bus Interface"));
00040 
00041     layout_ = new QGridLayout(this);
00042 
00043     // Check if name editing is requested.
00044     if (enableNameEdit)
00045     {
00046         // Create the name edit and its label.
00047         QLabel* nameLabel = new QLabel(tr("Name:"), this);
00048         nameEdit_ = new QLineEdit(this);
00049 
00050         layout_->addWidget(nameLabel, 0, 0, 1, 2);
00051         layout_->addWidget(nameEdit_, 1, 0, 1, 2);
00052     }
00053 
00054     // Create the radio button group and a layout for it.
00055     modeGroup_ = new QGroupBox(tr("Interface Mode"), this);
00056     QGridLayout* itemLayout = new QGridLayout(modeGroup_);
00057 
00058     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < General::MONITOR + 1; ++i)
00059     {
00060         modeRadioButtons_[i] = new QRadioButton(MODE_NAMES[i], modeGroup_);
00061         modeRadioButtons_[i]->setVisible(false);
00062         itemLayout->addWidget(modeRadioButtons_[i], i, 0, 1, 1);
00063     }
00064 
00065     layout_->addWidget(modeGroup_, 2, 0, 1, 2);
00066 
00067     // Create the OK and Cancel buttons.
00068     btnOK_ = new QPushButton(this);
00069     btnOK_->setText(tr("&OK"));
00070 
00071     if (enableNameEdit)
00072     {
00073         btnOK_->setEnabled(false);
00074     }
00075 
00076     layout_->addWidget(btnOK_, 3, 0, 1, 1);
00077 
00078     QPushButton* btnCancel = new QPushButton(this);
00079     btnCancel->setText(tr("&Cancel"));
00080     layout_->addWidget(btnCancel, 3, 1, 1, 1);
00081 
00082     // Connect the button signals to accept() and reject().
00083     connect(btnOK_, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()));
00084     connect(btnCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(reject()));
00085 
00086     if (nameEdit_ != 0)
00087     {
00088         connect(nameEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(QString const&)), this, SLOT(onNameChanged()));
00089     }
00090 }
00091

00094 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 BusInterfaceDialog::~BusInterfaceDialog()
00096 {
00097 }

00099 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 // Function: addMode()
00101 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00102 void BusInterfaceDialog::addMode(General::InterfaceMode mode)
00103 {
00104     modeRadioButtons_[mode]->setVisible(true);
00105     modeRadioButtons_[mode]->setChecked(true);
00106 }
00107 
00108 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 // Function: getSelectedMode()
00110 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 General::InterfaceMode BusInterfaceDialog::getSelectedMode() const
00112 {
00113     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < General::MONITOR + 1; ++i)
00114     {
00115         if (modeRadioButtons_[i]->isChecked())
00116         {
00117             return static_cast<General::InterfaceMode>(i);
00118         }
00119     }
00120 
00121     // Should not be possible to get here.
00122     Q_ASSERT(false);
00123     return General::MASTER;
00124 }
00125 
00126 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 // Function: setName()
00128 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00129 void BusInterfaceDialog::setName(QString const& name)
00130 {
00131     Q_ASSERT(nameEdit_ != 0);
00132     nameEdit_->setText(name);
00133 }
00134 
00135 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136 // Function: getName()
00137 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00138 QString BusInterfaceDialog::getName() const
00139 {
00140     Q_ASSERT(nameEdit_ != 0);
00141     return nameEdit_->text();
00142 }
00143 
00144 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00145 // Function: onNameChanged()
00146 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00147 void BusInterfaceDialog::onNameChanged()
00148 {
00149     btnOK_->setEnabled(!nameEdit_->text().isEmpty());
00150 }
